Use SPF protection during the day. Do not use together with other acids like AHAs, BHAs, and retinol. Mild irritation or redness may occur for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts. Contents may turn brown due to oxidation. To avoid this, store in a cool, dark space between 15 C ~ 25 C, as far away from light and heat as possible.
Use within 2 months of opening.

Warnings from packaging:
Do not use together with other acids like AHAs, BHAs, and retinol.
Mild irritation or redness may occur for first time users. If so, use every other night until skin adjusts.
Contents may darken due to retinol properties. Note this is a natural phenomenon that does not affect the potency of the product. Store in a cool, dark space between 15 C ~ 25 C, as far away from light and heat as possible. Use within 3 months of opening.
